title: DIVISION AÉRONAUTIQUE
description: The Aéronautique Division ensures the safety, airworthiness, and compliance of aircraft through rigorous assessments and monitoring.

services.name: Surveillance de navigabilité
services.description: Continuous monitoring to ensure aircraft remain airworthy and compliant with aviation standards.

services.name: Evaluation de la sécurité
services.description: Comprehensive safety evaluations to identify and mitigate potential risks in aviation operations.

services.name: Enquête sur les accidents et incidents graves.
services.description: Thorough investigations of accidents and serious incidents to enhance safety and prevent future occurrences.

services.name: Les contrôles SANAA SAFAA
services.description: Detailed checks under the SANAA SAFAA program to ensure compliance with international aviation safety standards.

name: Aero

title: Marine
description: The Marine Division focuses on the safety and regulatory compliance of maritime vessels through comprehensive inspections and monitoring.

services.name: Regulatory visits and inspections linked to IMO conventions (SOLAS, MARPOL)
services.description: Regular visits and inspections to ensure vessels comply with SOLAS and MARPOL conventions.

services.name: Monitoring of new constructions
services.description: Continuous monitoring of new maritime constructions to ensure adherence to safety standards.

services.name: Special, intermediate, annual, periodic, and occasional visits.
services.description: Scheduled and unscheduled visits to assess and ensure vessel safety and compliance.

services.name: Assistive techniques
services.description: Utilization of advanced techniques to assist in the inspection and maintenance of maritime vessels.

name: MARINE

title: Quality Control
description: The Quality Control Division ensures that products and processes meet the highest standards through rigorous inspection and verification.

services.name: Surveillance and auditing
services.description: Ongoing monitoring and auditing to ensure compliance with quality standards.

services.name: Testing and verification
services.description: Thorough testing and verification processes to confirm quality and reliability.

services.name: Certification services
services.description: Issuance of certifications to verify that products meet established quality standards.

services.name: Quality improvement consulting
services.description: Expert consulting services to help organizations improve their quality control practices.

name: CONTRÔLE DE QUALITÉ

title: Industrial Inspection
description: The Industrial Inspection Division ensures the safety and efficiency of industrial facilities through regular inspections and maintenance planning.

services.name: Routine inspections
services.description: Regular inspections to ensure industrial facilities meet safety and operational standards.

services.name: Safety audits
services.description: Comprehensive safety audits to identify potential hazards and implement corrective actions.

services.name: Maintenance planning
services.description: Strategic maintenance planning to prevent equipment failures and ensure operational efficiency.

services.name: Emergency response
services.description: Preparedness and response strategies for industrial emergencies to minimize impact and ensure safety.

name: INDUSTRIE

title: Rail and Guided Transport
description: The Rail and Guided Transport Division is dedicated to ensuring the safety and efficiency of rail and guided transport systems through meticulous inspections and audits.

services.name: Safety inspections
services.description: Regular safety inspections to ensure the safe operation of rail and guided transport systems.

services.name: Operational audits
services.description: Audits to assess the efficiency and safety of transport operations.

services.name: System maintenance
services.description: Comprehensive maintenance services to ensure the reliability and safety of transport systems.

services.name: Incident investigation
services.description: Detailed investigations of incidents to improve safety and prevent future occurrences.

name: TRANSPORT FERROVIAIRE ET GUIDE

title: Containers Control & Verification DIVISION
description: The Containers Control & Verification Division is tasked with ensuring the safety and compliance of container operations through inspections and monitoring.

services.name: Regulatory visits and inspections linked to IMO conventions (SOLAS, MARPOL)
services.description: Ensuring container operations comply with SOLAS and MARPOL regulations through regular inspections.

services.name: Monitoring of new constructions
services.description: Overseeing the construction of new container facilities to ensure they meet safety standards.

services.name: Special, intermediate, annual, periodic, and occasional visits.
services.description: Conducting various types of visits to ensure continuous compliance and safety.

services.name: Assistive techniques
services.description: Employing advanced techniques to assist in the inspection and verification of containers.

name: CONTROLE ET VERIFICATION DES CONTENEURS

title: Elevators Technical Inspection DIVISION
description: The Elevators Technical Inspection Division is responsible for ensuring the safety and compliance of elevators through rigorous inspections and monitoring.

services.name: Regulatory visits and inspections linked to IMO conventions (SOLAS, MARPOL)
services.description: Regular inspections to ensure elevators comply with relevant IMO conventions.

services.name: Monitoring of new constructions
services.description: Continuous oversight of new elevator constructions to ensure they meet safety standards.

services.name: Special, intermediate, annual, periodic, and occasional visits.
services.description: Various types of visits to maintain elevator safety and compliance.

services.name: Assistive techniques
services.description: Advanced techniques to support the inspection and maintenance of elevators.

name: INSPECTION TECHNIQUE DES ASCENSEURS
